choices: He wakes up a 2 year old
111111.content:
micheal, a 19 year old anthropomorphic fox who was a college student, he had a hard time trying to get his life through college, with all the work and stress he was dealing with.

micheal:*sigh*i'll never finish my biology assigment, it gonna take forever.

his roommate, joh, a golden retriever, was leaving the room.

john: hey, micheal, i'm gonna go to a party, wanna come.

micheal: sorry, i have a hell of a lot of homework to do.

john: okay then.

as john leaves the room, micheal lays his head on his desk.

micheal: it's no use, i'm never gonna be able to make it out of here, i'd like it better when i was younger, when i didn't have to worry about all the crap in the world.

micheal dscides to take a break as he lays down on his bed.

micheal: i wish my life was different.

after that, he suddenly falls asleep, unaware what's going to happen next.

what will happen next.
.

a story about anthro regression.Choose your gender spieces age and how youll regress and let the story roll

RULES:
1.no deaths
2.no vore or unbirthing
3.sex is okay at appropriate ages so no 2year olds cumming into each others okay

besides all that HAVE FUN!!!
